replies.body:
How did you even manage to get S grade with a kda like 16/10/8, what black magic did you use?

Anyways, sometimes it can be slow and taking its sweet time to arrive, I too once had a chest that didn't arrive until the next time I logged. Maybe you could try re-logging and see if it's there.
The CS and gold are really high, so if the game was less than 30 mins that could be why. Plus it's Syndra (I believe she's fairly high skill-capped, but could be wrong).
no syndra is literally spam q without even needing to hit it then press r and they die without anyway to stop it

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eGIOcliK,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-05-06T10:22:01.135+0000)
>
> no syndra is literally spam q then press r and they die without anyway to stop it

Advice from a Talon main like lol.

A, don't judge a book by its cover, last time i played talon was before they removed the silence on his e.
B, talon has massive delays now, especially compared to syndra, and he needs to hit every spell, not press r and call it a day.
C, the no chest issue is a bug that was made when they fixed the warwick issue the other day.
D, you cant possibly get 1800 mastery points from a single game, so you lied about it being first time.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eGIOcliK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-06T08:48:37.624+0000)
>
> How did you even manage to get S grade with a kda like 16/10/8, what black magic did you use?
> 
> Anyways, sometimes it can be slow and taking its sweet time to arrive, I too once had a chest that didn't arrive until the next time I logged. Maybe you could try re-logging and see if it's there.

CS, wards placed, damage done. Also, that was my first time playing Syndra, please don't hate.

I played it yesterday. Come to think of it, I have received no rewards for any champ I've played. Xayah and Rakan are the only champs I have chests for.

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eGIOcliK,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-05-06T13:17:40.793+0000)
>
> I played it yesterday. Come to think of it, I have received no rewards for any champ I've played. Xayah and Rakan are the only champs I have chests for.

It's not likely, but I guess the chances isn't none. You can always check with Riot Support, where despite the infamous copy-paste responses, generally if you can drag out the conversation to more than 2 or 3 back-and-forth conversation, you'd find yourself be talking to a human, and they do get things done most of the time from my experience. Anyway the point is, they can look into your account history and find out what's going on, if you've missed too many chests or that you just forgot many.
You can only earn a maximum of 5 chests a month I'm fairly sure, so you can't earn any more even if you get an S on a champion.
YOU HAVE NO PROOF! YOU DIDN'T EVEN SHOW US IF YOU HAD ANY AVAILABLE CHESTS
